Class SMTPProcessor

java.lang.Object

ConnectionProcessor, java.lang.Runnable
public class SMTPProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionProcessor

Handles an incoming SMTP connection. See rfc821 for details.

Author:
Eric Daugherty
